CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1959, pg. A24 reads: "Bishop And Wife - Bishop and Mrs. Hatcher just before the Bishop read pastoral appointments at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall Sunday. The Bishop is looking over the list. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Bishop and Mrs. Hatcher, standing on stage in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for AME annual conference
